treks.name: Adi Kailash & Om Parvat Trek
treks.description: Experience the divine beauty of Adi Kailash and Om Parvat in a single epic journey through the sacred Himalayas. This spiritual trek combines breathtaking mountain views with ancient pilgrimage routes.

overview.description: The Adi Kailash & Om Parvat Trek is a sacred journey that combines two of the most revered peaks in the Kumaon region. This trek takes you through pristine valleys, ancient trade routes, and offers unparalleled views of the majestic Himalayan peaks.
highlights: Sacred pilgrimage to Adi Kailash and Om Parvat
Breathtaking views of the Kumaon Himalayas
Camp under starlit skies in remote valleys
overview.airport: Pantnagar, which is 22 km away from Haldwani

sections.whoCanParticipate: This trek is suitable for experienced trekkers with good fitness levels. Participants should be able to walk 6-8 hours daily with a backpack. Prior high-altitude trekking experience is recommended.
sections.howToReach: The trek starts from Pithoragarh. You can reach Pithoragarh by road from Delhi/Dehradun or by air to Pantnagar Airport followed by a road journey.

inclusions: Experienced trek leader and local guides
First aid kit and medical support
Transport from Pithoragarh to trek start point
exclusions: Any costs due to unforeseen circumstances

itinerary.title: Arrival at Pithoragarh
itinerary.description: Arrive at Pithoragarh, meet your trek leader and team. Briefing about the trek and equipment check.

itinerary.title: Drive to Gunji
itinerary.description: Early morning drive to Gunji via Dharchula. Complete border formalities and acclimatize to altitude.

itinerary.title: Trek to Kalapani
itinerary.description: Start trekking along the Kali River. Pass through beautiful valleys and reach Kalapani for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Trek to Navidhang
itinerary.description: Continue trekking through the valley, crossing streams and reaching Navidhang base camp.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization Day
itinerary.description: Rest and acclimatize at Navidhang. Short walks around the camp to adjust to altitude.

itinerary.title: Trek to Adi Kailash Base
itinerary.description: Trek to the base of Adi Kailash. Set up camp with magnificent views of the sacred peak.

itinerary.title: Adi Kailash Darshan
itinerary.description: Early morning trek to Adi Kailash viewpoint. Perform puja and return to base camp.

itinerary.title: Trek to Om Parvat Base
itinerary.description: Trek towards Om Parvat, crossing high passes and beautiful valleys.

itinerary.title: Om Parvat Darshan
itinerary.description: Trek to Om Parvat viewpoint. Witness the sacred Om symbol on the mountain face.

itinerary.title: Return to Navidhang
itinerary.description: Start return journey, trek back to Navidhang base camp.

itinerary.title: Return to Kalapani
itinerary.description: Continue descent to Kalapani, retracing our steps through the valley.

itinerary.title: Return to Pithoragarh
itinerary.description: Drive back to Pithoragarh. Trip concludes with farewell dinner.

treks.name: Ali Bedni Bugyal Trek
treks.description: A beautiful trek through the stunning meadows of Ali and Bedni Bugyal, offering panoramic views of the Garhwal Himalayas and the sacred Trishul peak.

overview.description: The Ali Bedni Bugyal Trek is one of the most beautiful meadow treks in Uttarakhand. It takes you through lush green meadows dotted with wildflowers and offers spectacular views of the Trishul and Nanda Ghunti peaks.
highlights: Stunning meadow views at Ali and Bedni Bugyal
Panoramic views of Trishul and Nanda Ghunti peaks
Beautiful wildflowers in spring and summer
Relatively easy trek suitable for beginners

sections.whoCanParticipate: This trek is suitable for beginners with basic fitness. Participants should be able to walk 4-6 hours daily. No prior trekking experience required.
sections.howToReach: The trek starts from Lohajung. You can reach Lohajung by road from Rishikesh/Haridwar via Dehradun and Joshimath.

inclusions: Transport from Lohajung to trek start point

itinerary.title: Arrival at Lohajung
itinerary.description: Arrive at Lohajung, meet your trek leader and team. Briefing about the trek.

itinerary.title: Trek to Didna Village
itinerary.description: Start trekking through beautiful forests and reach Didna village for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Trek to Ali Bugyal
itinerary.description: Trek through dense forests and reach the beautiful Ali Bugyal meadows.

itinerary.title: Trek to Bedni Bugyal
itinerary.description: Short trek to Bedni Bugyal, explore the meadows and enjoy the views.

itinerary.title: Return to Didna
itinerary.description: Start return journey, trek back to Didna village.

itinerary.title: Return to Lohajung
itinerary.description: Final day of trek, return to Lohajung. Trip concludes.

treks.name: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
treks.description: Experience the majestic Annapurna Base Camp trek in Nepal, offering stunning views of the Annapurna massif and surrounding peaks in the heart of the Himalayas.

overview.description: The Annapurna Base Camp Trek is one of the most popular treks in Nepal, taking you through diverse landscapes from subtropical forests to alpine meadows, culminating at the base of the majestic Annapurna massif.
highlights: Rich cultural experience with Gurung villages
Natural hot springs at Jhinu Danda
Panoramic mountain views throughout the trek
overview.month: March to May, September to November

sections.whoCanParticipate: This trek is suitable for trekkers with moderate fitness levels. Participants should be able to walk 5-7 hours daily with gradual altitude gain.
sections.howToReach: The trek starts from Pokhara. You can reach Pokhara by flight from Kathmandu or by road from major cities in Nepal.

inclusions: First aid kit and medical support
Transport from Pokhara to trek start point

itinerary.title: Arrival at Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Kathmandu, transfer to hotel. Briefing about the trek.

itinerary.title: Drive to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Drive to Pokhara, explore the beautiful lake city.

itinerary.title: Drive to Nayapul, Trek to Tikhedhunga
itinerary.description: Drive to Nayapul and start trekking to Tikhedhunga.

itinerary.title: Trek to Ghorepani
itinerary.description: Trek through beautiful rhododendron forests to Ghorepani.

itinerary.title: Poon Hill Sunrise, Trek to Tadapani
itinerary.description: Early morning hike to Poon Hill for sunrise, then trek to Tadapani.

itinerary.title: Trek to Chhomrong
itinerary.description: Trek to Chhomrong village with beautiful mountain views.

itinerary.title: Trek to Dovan
itinerary.description: Continue trekking through the valley to Dovan.

itinerary.title: Trek to Deurali
itinerary.description: Trek to Deurali, entering the Annapurna Sanctuary.

itinerary.title: Trek to Machhapuchhre Base Camp
itinerary.description: Trek to Machhapuchhre Base Camp with stunning mountain views.

itinerary.title: Trek to Annapurna Base Camp
itinerary.description: Short trek to Annapurna Base Camp, surrounded by towering peaks.

itinerary.title: Return to Deurali
itinerary.description: Start return journey, trek back to Deurali.

itinerary.title: Return to Chhomrong
itinerary.description: Continue descent to Chhomrong.

itinerary.title: Return to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Trek to Nayapul and drive back to Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Drive back to Kathmandu. Trip concludes.
